citeulike_paper.title: The power of naive query segmentation
citeulike_paper.abstract: We address the problem of query segmentation: given a keyword query submitted to a search engine, the task is to group the keywords into phrases, if possible. Previous approaches to the problem achieve good segmentation performance on a gold standard but are fairly intricate. Our method is easy to implement and comes with a comparable accuracy.

source.title: In Proceedings of the 33rd international ACM SIGIR conference on Research and development in information retrieval (2010), pp. 797-798, doi:10.1145/1835449.1835621ￂﾠ Key: citeulike:11486521

scholarly_article.title: The power of naive query segmentation
